data.name: This Side (Early Access Game)
data.detailed_description:
This Side is a co-op roguelike survival horror game.

Be Aware

The game is currently on Early Access version so please be patient and if you find someting that you think we could improve or need to be fixed don't be shy and lets us know here on Steam or even on our social media!

The History

At this current version This Side it's about two friends that need help each other to find a way out of a dangerous place. In the future we aim to increase the amount of information about the place and tells to the players whats happens there.

Key Features

Co-Op


We aim for This Side to be a true co-operative experience where both players need to help each other to finish the game.
The game has two play sides Inside and Outside the mines.

Inside the Mines
Inside the mine the player faces the hazardous environment of a abandoned mine.
For now we get the cave collapsing areas, so the player need to keep moving while the caves collapses over his head.
Our goal with the final experience its to make its struggling and visceral like a real survival experience inside a confusing and dangerous place.

Outside the Mines
Outside the player needs to find its way to help his friend by controlling the environment inside the mines while it faces his own problems.
At the current version the player need to find some electric components and use them to open some water control gates so he can release his friend.
Our goal with the final experience its to make frightening by the need for help while one player faces the struggle inside the mines he put his pain on his friend shoulders.

Survival
Both player in the future will have survival mechanics based on his own environment the idea behind that its not to flood the player by resources administration bur make the sense of surviving more believable. At the same time we aim to make the survival experience more co-operative.

Roguelike

Every aspect in the game is being designed to be roguelike. We aim that all play through to be a new and different experience. Every time we start to talk about a new mechanic e talk about how it can be done procedurally.

In this version we created a fully procedural cave that fits most of our game design needs so every time you play you will find a new cave. The electrical components and the Water control gates are procedural too.

Single Player

In this version the player plays with both sides but we aim to make more like a "single player" feeling of our multiplayer core.
In the future the player will chose which side he want to play and will help or be helped by an AI. We're no aimomg for a training or tutorial mode it will be more like a Hardcore gameplay mode.


Find players. chat, report bugs and help us to improve the game!
https://discord.gg/5XXQ639

About the development team

This Side is made on a co-production of two Brazilian game studios, Rising and Crystal Realms.

About the Engine

This Side is made with the full power of Unreal Engine 4.

Warning

The game contains flashing lights that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive conditions. Player discretion is advised.

data.short_description: Fight your fears and help your friend to find a way to escape of this forgotten place. Set on a abandoned mine. This Side is a roguelike survival horror game that you will have a terrifying experience with your friend to find the way for freedom.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I3 2.3 Ghz 2 Cores
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 660 2gb Vram
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel I5 3.3 Ghz 4 Cores
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 3Gb Vram
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible
